CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL( Gong__Scorecard_Question_Type__c , 'RANGE'),IF(Gong__Scorecard_Question_Answer_Text__c=='Not answered','Not Answered',IF(Gong__Scorecard_Question_Answer_Text__c=='NA','NA',IMAGE( '/resource/Gong__' & Gong__Scorecard_Question_Answer_Text__c , Gong__Scorecard_Question_Answer_Text__c )) ), Gong__Scorecard_Question_Answer_Text__c )
CustomField.label: Answer
